description:
Description
A powerful blend of Retinol and Retinal to improve firmness and texture, delivered through a Boosting Shot system for deeper absorption and visibly stronger skin.Clinically Proven Firming Shot Powered by 0.2% Retinol + RetinalThis high-performance ampoule blends 0.2% Retinol, Retinal, Madagascar Centella, and Panthenol, delivered through micro-sized spicules (avg. 13μm)—smaller than the average pore size—for optimized absorption and visible results.How It Works – 3-Step Delivery SystemSTEP 1: Creates absorption pathways with micro-sized Boosting Shot spiculesSTEP 2: Delivers Retinol, Retinal, and Squalane deep into the skinSTEP 3: Restores elasticity and strengthens the barrier for smooth, resilient skinClinically Proven Results- 132.8% higher absorption rate compared to spicule-free control group- Improved skin elasticity after just one use- Enhanced skin density and pore elasticity after 2 weeks- Visible reduction in fine lines and wrinkles after 2 weeks- Strengthened and repaired skin barrier after 1 week- Completed skin irritation test — hypoallergenic and safe for sensitive skin*Human Skin Absorption Evaluation Test of SKIN1004 Madagascar Centella Matrixyl 10 Boosting Shot Ampoule and Spicule-Free In-House Sample (2025.02.24–2025.02.27 / 20 adult women aged 20–49 / Korea Dermatology Research Institute).*The same spicules were used in the Matrixyl ampoule and were clinically substituted for absorption validation.
How To Use1. Use in the evening after cleansing and toning.2. Apply a small amount evenly to the face, avoiding the eye and lip areas.3. Start by using 2–3 times a week and gradually increase frequency as tolerated.4. Follow with a moisturizer.5. Apply sunscreen during the day when using retinol products.

Key Ingredients
0.2% Retinol, Retinal, Squalane, Madagascar Centella Asiatica Extract, Panthenol, Hydrolyzed Sponge(Spicules)

description:
Description

With the power of Matrixyl and hyaluronic acid, the Boosting Shot delivers concentrated ingredients deep into the skin for visible hydration and firmness.Clinically Proven Hydration & Firming Shot Powered by 10% Matrixyl 3000®This deeply hydrating ampoule features 10% Matrixyl 3000®, Madagascar Centella, and Panthenol, delivered through micro-sized spicules (avg. 13μm)—smaller than the average pore size—for optimized absorption and performance.How It Works – 3-Step Delivery SystemSTEP 1: Creates micro-pathways for enhanced ingredient absorptionSTEP 2: Delivers active ingredients deep into the skinSTEP 3: Visibly restores hydration and volume, promoting firmer, plumper skin

description:
Description


This serum is designed for troubled skin to solve skin trouble while soothing at the same time.
Sodium Heparin, Panthenol, Allantoin and Artemisia Princeps Leaf Extract soothe the skin and reduce skin redness.
Apple Extract helps reducing sebums, whiteheads and blackheads, thus suppressing the occurence of troubles.
Passed skin irritation test, it is suitable for sensitive skin.

1. Apply a proper amount onto skin and tap for absorption.

2. For a special care, soak the cotton pad with serum and leave on skin for 20-30 minutes.

description:
Description


[ 13% Panthenol for Deep Hydration ] High concentration of Panthenol (Vitamin B5) acts as a hydration building block, attracting and retaining deep moisture within the skin layers. It soothes irritation and enhances skin resilience against daily environmental stressors, leaving it soft and nourished.
[ Glowing Radiance with Damyang Bamboo ] Rich in essential amino acids, Korean Damyang Bamboo Extract deeply hydrates and enhances moisture retention, helping to keep your skin plump, glowing, and radiant. This K-beauty ingredient works to mimic the body’s natural moisture balance for a luminous finish.
[ Gentle and Safe for All Skin Types ] Dermatologist-tested and hypoallergenic, this serum is free of artificial fragrances and essential oils, making it ideal for all skin types including the sensitive skin.
[ Vegan & Clean Beauty Formula ] Lightweight, fast-absorbing serum leaves your skin feeling refreshed and hydrated without a sticky residue. Made with plant-based, cruelty-free ingredients, it’s perfect for your clean and conscious skincare routine while providing glowing results.
[ Complete Your Moisturizing Routine ] Begin with our Panthenol Cleanser to gently cleanse, follow with the Panthenol Serum to deeply hydrate, and finish with the Panthenol Cream to lock in moisture—your complete skincare routine for smooth, refreshed, and radiant skin.
 
How To Use

For Moisture Barrier Repair
Take an appropriate amount and apply evenly to the face and neck, patting gently to aid absorption.
For more effective moisture barrier repair results, we recommend using this in combination with the Mighty Bamboo Panthenol Cleanser and Cream.

For A Nourished Glow
Apply 2-3 layers of this highly enriched serum to maximize its ability to deliver nutrients to your skin and unveil a healthy, glossy glow.
 
Key Ingredients

reviews.title: Better than Anua
reviews.content:
I’ve been using the Medicube TXA Niacinamide 15% Serum for about a month now, and I’m genuinely impressed with the results. My skin tone has become noticeably more even, and some of the stubborn dark spots I’ve had for years are visibly lighter. The serum has a lightweight, non-sticky texture that absorbs quickly, making it a seamless addition to my nightly skincare routine. ￼

One of the standout features for me is its formulation. With 10% Niacinamide and 5% Tranexamic Acid, it’s potent yet gentle. I have sensitive skin, and I’ve experienced no irritation or breakouts since incorporating this serum. In fact, my skin feels more hydrated and looks brighter overall. ￼

I’ve tried several serums in the past, but this one delivers results comparable to high-end products at a fraction of the price. It’s become a staple in my skincare regimen, and I highly recommend it to anyone dealing with hyperpigmentation or uneven skin tone.

Salmon Caring Centella Special Travel Kit Bag is the ultimate skincare set for those who want to care for their skin on the go. This compact, travel-friendly kit features a range of nourishing products infused with salmon extract and centella asiatica, both renowned for their skin-soothing and revitalizing properties. - Hydrating, Lightweight Formula: The PDRN Pink Collagen Exosome Shot Serum is formulated with a lightweight and watery texture, offering a pleasant application experience. For first-time users of products containing spicules, it is recommended to start with a concentration of 2,000 PPM.

How To Use

In the first step of your skincare routine, apply a moderate amount on your face.

description:
Description
A vegan all-in-one serum enriched with 10% PHA & AHA to minimize enlarged pores by dissolving crystalized sebum.Purify skin condition and smoothens skin texture with a subtle glow.Help shed dead skin cells on the skin surface and dissolve accumulated, hardened sebum plugs, while preventing sebum from becoming crystalized.Formulated with naturally healing flower Calendula extract to offer soothing and calming effect.
Free from harmful ingredients, suitable for sensitive skin. 
How To Use1. Use once or twice daily after cleansing and toning.2. Apply a dime-sized amount over the entire face, avoiding direct contact with eyes and lips.3. Do not rinse. Lightly pat skin to enhance absorption of remaining product into skin.Tips : If your skin is extremely sensitive, it's best to begin by using a small amount of the product in the evening only, gradually increasing the frequency over time. We advise testing and proceeding cautiously, especially if you have sensitive skin, when using the product alongside other exfoliating ingredients like BHA or Vitamin C to prevent potential irritation. 
Key Ingredients 10% PHA & AHAGentle chemical exfoliators that help shed dead skin cells on the skin surface and dissolve accumulated, hardened sebum plugs, while preventing sebum from becoming crystalized. This gentle but effective exfoliating duo revitalizes the skin, leaving noticeable radiance after use, minimizing the appearance of pores and fine lines, making your skin look and feel noticeably softer.CalendulaKnown for its long-term effectiveness in gentle skincare, this natural ingredient provides effective management for low-irritant skin care, soothing, and supplying moisture.HYAL 7 COMPLEXEnriched with HYDRATIVE™, this complex provides moisture care, resulting in improved skin texture and a radiant complexion.

product_name: Black Rice Night Knight Retinol Serum 20ml
description:
Description

formulated for sensitive skin, the Black Rice Night Knight Retinol Serum is a highly effective, but gentle, retinol serum that renews and protects the skin. -With microencapsulated retinol (0.08%) and non-irritating retinol alternative bakuchiol (1%), it refines skin texture, softens fine lines and wrinkles, and evens out the skin tone, all while supporting healthy skin function and keeping pores clear. -Moisturizing and soothing ingredients such as ceramides, sunflower seed oil, and antioxidant rich fermented black rice ensure the skin is kept soft, hydrated and soothed.


A vegan mild serum formulated with microencapsulated Retinol amd Bakuchiol to refine overall skin texture and help fade the appearances of fine lines and wrinkles, while evening out skin tone.
Helps with enlarged pores, while supporting skin barrier function.
Contains moisturizing and soothing ingredients such as Ceramides and Sunflower Seed Oil to retain moisture and soothe skin.
Infused with Fermented Oryza Sativa (Rice) Extract to deliver nourishment to skin, while amplifying moisturizing effects.
A lgihtweight milky texture that leaves a soft and hydrating finish without irritation, suitable for sensitive skin.
 
How To Use
1. In the PM, apply a pea-size amount onto cleansed and toned skin, avoiding eyes and mouth.
2. Apply SPF during daytime when using this serum.
3. Usage frequency can be gradually increased from 1 to 2 times a week to daily.

description:
Description
The Mixsoon Noni Fruit Essence provides the skin with plenty of moisture and a fresh, healthy complexion. This essence contains raw material that was carefully selected for constant skin change, not just for momentary hydration. The noni fruit grows in tropical regions and is also known as a medicinal fruit, as it contains over 200 nutrients, vitamins and minerals which protect the skin balance and prevent skin damage. This essence has a strengtening effect and ensures healthy, glowing skin. It restores the skin barrier damaged by external stimuli to make the skin more resistant and balanced, reducing the risk of acne and redness.- Mixsoon Noni Fruit Essence is formulated with 100% Noni Fruit Extracts that contain over 200 phytonutrients and challenge skin-damaging free radicals, leaving your skin resilient and elastic.- This lightweight essence has a strengthening effect, and restores damaged skin barriers with rich vitamins and minerals, reducing the risk of acne and redness.- Suitable for all skin types, perfect for dull/sensitive skin.

How To UseMixsoon Noni Fruit Essence is suitable to use for both morning and evening skincare routines.- For Daily Use: After cleansing, apply a few drops to the entire face with your hands or with cotton pads. Pat in until fully absorbed.- Mix It Up: Mix any products of yours in a 10:1 ratio (10 of your other products, 1 of mixsoon water essence) for extra nourishment.- DIY Face Mask: Soak cotton pads with mixsoon facial essence and apply on skin. Remove after 10 minutes.

Key IngredientsWater, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Morinda Citrifolia Fruit Extract

The Mixsoon Lotus Flower Essence is perfect for revilatizing tired, dull, irritated and ageing skin. This essence will make your complexion appear healthier, glowing and radiant. This essence provides lots of benefits such as hydration, brightening and improving dark spots and hyperpigmentation, balancing sebum production, and protecting the skin from external stimuli. - 100% natural lotus flower extract. No alcohol. No fragrance. Single ingredient water essence that boosts hydration and elasticity! Lotus flower extract improves blood circulation to remove impurities, helping to soothe irritated and inflamed skin. Full of antioxidants, including Vitamin C.- Recommended for irritated skin from wearing masks, aging skin, tired skin that needs elasticity, dull-looking skin due to discoloration.

reviews.title: Love this product..
reviews.content:
This facial mist is a real treat! It's a bi-phase serum, meaning it has two layers – an oil layer and an essence layer – that you shake to mix before spraying. The main selling point is the white truffle extract, which is known for its antioxidant and hydrating properties. The spray itself is incredibly fine and delivers a refreshing burst of moisture to the skin.

The immediate effect is a noticeable glow and a feeling of hydration. It's perfect for use throughout the day to refresh your makeup or combat dry skin. Over time, I've noticed a subtle improvement in my skin's overall radiance and a reduction in dryness. The scent is subtle and pleasant, and the spray bottle is convenient to use.

Overall, the d'Alba White Truffle First Spray Serum is a luxurious and effective product. It's a bit pricey, but the quality of the ingredients and the noticeable results make it worth considering. If you're looking for a hydrating mist.

description:
Description

Featuring patented skincare ingredients that support skin regeneration, this product helps maintain healthy skin turnover and enhances skin clarity, resulting in a naturally refined and smooth texture
Featuring patented ingredients that help support a balanced skin appearance, this product includes a unique component that helps reduce the appearance of uneven skin tone over time, promoting a more radiant and even-looking complexion.
Supporting the skin's resilience by enhancing the ECM (Extracellular Matrix) layer deep within the dermis. A reduction in the ECM is a key factor in skin aging, contributing to thinning, fine lines, loss of firmness, and uneven skin texture. Structural proteins help activate the ECM layer and support skin renewal, promoting the appearance of healthy and firm skin
Specifically designed for sensitive and reactive skin, with a 0.00 irritation score in human application tests. Picotonic Cream enhances the appearance of uneven skin tone, promoting a more luminous and revitalized look with ingredients known for supporting skin clarity.

Apply an appropriate amount on the bare face that has been cleaned cleanly and spread it out like a massage.

description:
Description


Medicube Deep Vita C Serum is a facial serum that is a water-based serum with 14.5% vitamin C and Alpha-bisabolol to reduce hyperpigmentation, even out skin tone, and enhance skin radiance.
In just one week, see a visible difference with 9.1% reduction in freckles and blemishes, 4.8% improvement in skin tone, and 0.6% increase in skin radiance. The serum also increases skin elasticity by 10.3% and provides a significant reduction in bumpy skin and saggy skin.
The serum contains 14.5% vitamin C that helps to inhibit melanin production, reduce hyperpigmentation, and even out skin tone. Alpha-bisabolol is known for its enhancing radiance as well as soothing and calming properties, making it a perfect ingredient for sensitive skin types.
After cleansing and toning, apply 2-3 drops of the serum to the face and neck, avoiding the eye area. Follow with moisturizer and sunscreen in the morning. Use daily for best results.
Everyone has skin concerns. But not everyone finds the right solution. By working with dermatologists, we research the most effective formula and develop using the best ingredients.

description:
Description

A whitening serum infused with of vitamin C solution, hyaluronic acid solution, and other naturally-derived ingredients, helping improve the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines effectively.

Helps brighten dull complexion.

Helps improve wrinkles and complexion while reducing the appearance of dark circles and acne scars.

Vitamin E, Ginseng Root Extract, and Curcuma Longa Root Extract improve the skin elasticity and help reduce wrinkles.

Free from paraben, ethanol, surfactant, artificial colorant and fragrance, triethanolamine, phthalein, triclosan, petrochemicals, and benzoyl peroxide.

Formulated with natural fading-protecting agents that prevent rapid oxidation and packaged in a dark brown bottle to provide the ingredients with maximum protection from sunlight, we have improved the stability of this product.
A slight tingling sensation can be expected, due to the nature of pure vitamin C. It is a natural phenomenon caused by the difference in pH level of the skin and the vitamin C. For sensitive skin, it is recommended to use a toner and moisturizer right after the application of the Vitamin C.
You can use this product during the day, however, during the daytime, we suggest applying sunscreen on top of the Vitamin C.
Do not use this product together with the chemical exfoliating ingredients such as AHA, BHA, Retinol.
If you have sensitive skin, it is recommended to apply a smaller amount first and adjust the application amount gradually.

How To Use
- Can be used in the morning or evening.
1. Use after cleansing.
2. Dispense 1-2 doses and apply to the entire face.
3. Lightly pat for better absorption.

description:
Description


Experience clear, hydrated radiance with our Hydrop Riddle Shot 100hL. The Cica Riddle™ ingredient enhances absorption while synergizing with hydrating glow agents for a luminous, moisturized complexion.

* What is hL?
hL stands for Hydrating Level, a new hydration unit in the Hydrop Riddle Shot line. The Sica Riddle™ and HA-Nano Capsules are designed at an optimal strength to effectively boost moisture, ensuring your skin receives ample hydration.


- Point 1: Ideal Ratio of Hyaluronic Acid and Cica Riddle™

HA-Nano Capsule: Utilizing VT Deep Hydration technology, these nano-sized capsules ensure deep and lasting moisture.
Cica Riddle™: Boosts skin texture and aids absorption.
300Da Ultra Low Molecular Weight Hyaluronic Acid: Provides high adhesion and intensive moisture care due to its small molecular size.

- Point 2: Delivering HA-Nano Capsules to the Skin with VT Deep Hydration Technology

VT Deep Hydration Technology: This patented technology enhances moisture delivery by attaching skin-friendly carriers to HA-Nano Capsules, effectively transporting hyaluronic acid to dry areas and significantly boosting hydration.
How To Use

Step 1: Apply Riddle Shot as the first step of your skincare routine after cleansing. Dispense an appropriate amount and apply to your clean, bare face.
Step 2: Gently massage in a rolling motion for better absorption. Finish by pressing your palms gently against your face to ensure thorough absorption.
Step 3: Hydrop Riddle Shot 100hL, 300hL, and 700hL can be used every morning and evening. For morning use, it is recommended to pair with sunscreen.

description:
Description


Experience clear, hydrated radiance with our Hydrop Riddle Shot 100hL. The Sica Riddle™ ingredient enhances absorption while synergizing with hydrating glow agents for a luminous, moisturized complexion.

*What is hL?
hL stands for Hydrating Level, a new hydration unit in the Hydrop Riddle Shot line. The Sica Riddle™ and HA-Nano Capsules are designed at an optimal strength to effectively boost moisture, ensuring your skin receives ample hydration.


- Point 1: Ideal Ratio of Hyaluronic Acid and Sica Riddle™

HA-Nano Capsule: Utilizing VT Deep Hydration technology, these nano-sized capsules ensure deep and lasting moisture.
Cica Riddle™: Boosts skin texture and aids absorption.
300Da Ultra Low Molecular Weight Hyaluronic Acid: Provides high adhesion and intensive moisture care due to its small molecular size.

- Point 2: Delivering HA-Nano Capsules to the Skin with VT Deep Hydration Technology

VT Deep Hydration Technology: This patented technology enhances moisture delivery by attaching skin-friendly carriers to HA-Nano Capsules, effectively transporting hyaluronic acid to dry areas and significantly boosting hydration.

How To Use

Step 1: Apply Riddle Shot as the first step of your skincare routine after cleansing. Dispense an appropriate amount and apply to your clean, bare face.
Step 2: Gently massage in a rolling motion for better absorption. Finish by pressing your palms gently against your face to ensure thorough absorption.
Step 3: Hydrop Riddle Shot 100hL, 300hL, and 700hL can be used every morning and evening. For morning use, it is recommended to pair with sunscreen.

reviews.title: APLB Bakuchiol Propolis Ampoule Serum (40ml) – Gif…
reviews.content:
**Review: APLB Bakuchiol Propolis Ampoule Serum (40ml) – Gifted to My 16-Year-Old Niece**

 

I recently gifted my 16-year-old niece the **APLB Bakuchiol Propolis Ampoule Serum**, and it has quickly become a standout product in her skincare routine. After using it consistently, she’s absolutely in love with it, and I can see why—this serum is gentle, effective, and perfect for her young skin.

 

### **Packaging:**

The **40ml** bottle comes in a sleek, minimalist design that feels luxurious yet simple. The dropper is easy to use, allowing her to dispense just the right amount of serum without wasting product. The glass bottle feels sturdy and high-quality, and its size is perfect for keeping on her vanity or taking with her when traveling.

 

### **Texture and Application:**

The serum has a lightweight, silky texture that feels smooth and soothing on the skin. When she applies it, it absorbs quickly without any sticky residue, leaving her skin feeling soft and hydrated. My niece loves how easily it glides over her skin, making it feel like a little moment of self-care every time she uses it.

 

She’s noticed that just a few drops are enough to cover her face, and it layers beautifully under her moisturizer, making it perfect for both her morning and night routines.

 

### **Ingredients and Benefits:**

The **Bakuchiol** in this serum is a standout ingredient—it’s often referred to as a natural alternative to retinol, offering similar benefits for the skin, such as promoting a healthy, youthful appearance without the irritation that retinol can sometimes cause. Bakuchiol is known for being gentle, making it perfect for teenage skin, which can be sensitive and still prone to occasional breakouts.

 

The **Propolis** extract is also fantastic for soothing the skin and providing an antibacterial effect, helping to calm any redness or inflammation. My niece has noticed that it helps keep her skin feeling calm and balanced, and it’s been great for soothing any minor irritation or blemishes she occasionally experiences.

 

### **Scent:**

The serum has a very mild, natural scent that’s light and refreshing. It doesn’t have an overpowering fragrance, which is perfect for my niece, who prefers skincare products that don’t have a strong scent. It’s subtle enough that it doesn’t linger and doesn’t interfere with other products in her routine.

 

### **Performance:**

After using the **APLB Bakuchiol Propolis Ampoule Serum** for a few weeks, my niece has noticed smoother, clearer, and more balanced skin. It has helped keep her skin looking fresh and hydrated while minimizing any redness or inflammation she sometimes gets. The gentle nature of Bakuchiol has also helped reduce the appearance of any minor blemishes without causing irritation, and her skin looks noticeably brighter and calmer.

 

Her skin feels soft and rejuvenated after every use, and she’s excited to continue using it. She loves how the serum makes her skin feel hydrated without being too heavy or greasy—perfect for her combination skin.

 

### **Final Thoughts:**

Overall, the **APLB Bakuchiol Propolis Ampoule Serum** has been a fantastic gift for my 16-year-old niece. It’s gentle yet effective, helping to calm, hydrate, and balance her skin while offering anti-aging benefits without any irritation. It’s the perfect product for young skin that needs care and hydration, and my niece loves the results she’s seeing.

 

I would highly recommend this serum to teens looking to add something gentle but effective to their skincare routine. It’s a great introduction to more advanced skincare ingredients like Bakuchiol and Propolis, and it’s sure to help keep their skin healthy, hydrated, and balanced!

description:
Description

The Collagen Glow Booster Milk Serum, your key to achieving cushiony, supple skin with a luminous glow. Formulated with a potent blend of ingredients, including Niacinamide, Milk Protein Extract, and Hydrolyzed Collagen, this smooth, milky-textured serum delivers unparalleled hydration and rejuvenation to your skin.

More than just a skincare product, it's a skincare journey. Our innovative packaging features a twist-push button mechanism, ensuring each application dispenses the perfect amount of serum for optimal results. Moreover, our airless container design seals off external air, safeguarding the serum's potency and freshness. Crafted for your convenience, our portable packaging lets you carry the Collagen Glow Booster Milk Serum wherever you go, so you can nourish your skin on the fly.

Unlock the secret to youthful, glowing skin with the Collagen Glow Booster Milk Serum. Try it today and discover the transformative power of premium skincare.

How To Use

Apply a generous amount morning and night on clean, dry skin. Open the cap and twist the push-button counterclockwise to activate, then click to dispense(2-4 pumps per use). Gently press serum onto face, neck and décolleté. After use, close the cap and twist the push-button clockwise to lock.
Pro tip!
Add a shot* to your serums/creams for enhanced radiance and hydration. For best results, use Collagen Niacinamide Jelly Cream and Booster Pro(Booster Mode). *"Shot" means "Pump".

Key Ingredients
Water, Glycerin, Dicaprylyl Ether, Isononyl Isononanoate, Butylene Glycol, Dipropylene Glycol, C9-12 Alkane, Peg-30 Dipolyhydroxystearate, Polyglyceryl-4 Oleate, Magnesium Sulfate, Niacinamide, 1,2-Hexanediol, Polyglyceryl-3 Polyricinoleate, Milk Protein Extract, Fragrance(Parfum), Caprylyl Glycol, Chlorella Vulgaris Extract, Glucose, Fructooligosaccharides, Fructose, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Adenosine, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Soluble Proteoglycan, Ethylhexylglycerin, Benzyl Salicylate, Limonene, Ceramide Np, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Hyaluronate, Linalool, Hexyl Cinnamal, Hydroxycitronellal, Tocopherol, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Beta-Glucan, Geraniol, Hydrolyzed Elastin, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Hexapeptide-2, Biotin, Sodium Dna

description:
Description

Tingling sensation is natural. You may experience a tingling sensation, which may last for some time, but rest assured that this is a natural reaction to the Zero Exosome Shot.

Drawing upon the principles of microneedling, we've crafted a micro-sized, needle-shaped booster to target a range of skin issues. Enhanced with 15M patented Exosome shots, this formula physically delivers active ingredients to pores, providing daily intensive treatments for home use. Clinically validated to care for pore size, smooth skin texture, strengthen the skin barrier, and promote a radiant complexion.
How To Use

BEGINNER
If you are not familiar with skincare products containing spicules, we do not recommend using them with our AGE-R devices.
Step 1. After cleansing, prepare your skin with Meicube's Zero Pore Pads (or other hydrating toners).
Step 2. Apply the Zero One Day Exosome Shot to the desired area (e.g., areas with uneven texture, enlarged pores, etc.) and gently rub and press to aid absorption.
Step 3. Finish with Medicube's Collagen Jelly Cream (or your daily water-based moisturizer).
STANDARD
Step 1. After cleansing, apply the Zero One Day Exosome Shot to your entire face, avoiding the area near your eyes and lips. For the best results, we recommend using the Exosome Shot as the first step in your skincare routine.
Step 2. Gently rub and press with your hands to ensure that the needle-like formula is absorbed deep into your skin.
Step 3. Finish with Medicube’s Collagen Jelly Cream (or your daily water-based moisturizer).
Pro tip! To maximize the effect, apply the Zero One Day Exosome Serum after using the "Air Shot Mode" of the AGE-R Booster Pro.

Key Ingredients
Water, Dipropylene Glycol, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Niacinamide, Sodium Polyacrylate, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, C12-14 Alketh-12, Hydrogenated Polydecene, Hydrolyzed Sponge, Ethylhexylglycerin, Adenosine, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Disodium EDTA, Panthenol, Lactobacillus Extracellular Vesicles, Campsis Grandiflora Flower Extract, Pueraria Lobata Root Extract, Pinus Palustris Leaf Extract, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Flower Extract, Ulmus Davidiana Root Extract, Calcium Silicate, Sodium Silicate, Betaine Salicylate, Citric Acid, Gluconolactone

description:
Description

An essence based on retinol and bakuchiol that will help moisturize the skin, prevent signs of aging, provide a lifting effect and give the skin elasticity and firmness. Provides deep hydration.

Contains high levels of nutrients: Bakuchiol liposomes + retinol liposomes, plus 84% highly concentrated microbiome ingredients.
The essence has a creamy milky texture.

Skin type: dry, normal, combination, sensitive

How To Use
Morning and night apply a small amount to your hands or cotton pad and gently pat into the skin for absorption.
Key Ingredients
* Retinol is a powerful anti-aging active,which accelerates cell regeneration processes in the epidermis, gives a lifting effect, increases the elasticity and firmness of tissues, has a slight brightening effect.

* Bakuchiol is a plant and softer analog of the famous retinol. Stimulates the production of natural collagen in the cells, fights wrinkles, improves skin elasticity and suppresses the production of melanin.

* Grape extract stimulates the production of collagen and elastin, which help reduce wrinkles, increase skin tone and tighten it;

* Peptide complex – strengthens the skin's protective barrier, works with wrinkles;

* Shea butter helps to moisturize rough and dry skin, forming a protective film of moisture.

product_name: Reedle Shot Vita-Light Toning Essence VC1000
description:
Description


This beginner-friendly toning essence VC1000 awakens the skin condition and helps the absorption of vitamin C, helping you achieve a bright skin tone.
Cica Reedle takes care of dead skin cells and impurities accumulated on the skin and improves dull skin.
Infused with Vitamin E to boost skin hydration,and Vitamin B3 to even out skin tone and improve skin elasticity.
The nutritious moist cream essence texture gently penetrates the skin, leaving your skin bright and moisturized without sickness.

How To Use
1. After cleansing and toning, pour bottle 2 (essence) into bottle 1 (powder) and mix using the inserted spatula.
2. After mixing, insert the enclosed transparent cone.
3. When using, shake sufficiently and take an appropriate amount, spread it on the face.
4. This product contains a high content of vitamin C, so if using it in the morning, please use sunscreen together.

description:
Description


An intensive anti-aging ampoule that helps address signs of skin fatigue, such as dryness, dullness and reduced elasticity.

Hydrating, nourishing and soothing, this all-in-one ampoule cares for our skin's protective barrier by preventing moisture loss throughout the day and/or night.

Packed with antioxidants and infused with the goodness of hyaluronic acid, niacinamide and adenosine, this ampoule makes for the ultimate anti-aging serum step!

Reset Concentrate™
A powerful antioxidant and anti-aging compound extracted from 80% fermented and mineral water-infused Black Tea, helping address the look of fatigued skin.

Night Care Solution
A combination of skin-loving ingredients that work together to help pull moisture inward and create a protective barrier on the skin, a process which is especially important as we sleep. Please note, however, that our Black Tea Youth Enhancing range can also be used during the daytime.

Best suited for: Normal-to-dry and combination skin types
How To Use

Press dropper to dispense desired amount of product, and gently massage into the skin, patting for better absorption.

This ampoule can be layered as desired for a more intensive moisturising effect, and can be used day and/or night.

description:
Description

Dr. Althea Vitamin C Boosting Serum focuses on revitalizing your skin from within to deliver powerful brightening benefits and deep hydration. 

Formulated with Hippophae Rhamnoides Water and Tranexamic Acid, this serum improves dull and uneven skin tone. It contains 63% Hippophae Rhamnoides Water, a natural ingredient rich in vitamin C, which offers powerful brightening effects while being milder than standard vitamin C serums—making it suitable for sensitive skin.

Additionally, the serum includes Centella Asiatica Leaf Water and eight types of hyaluronic acid, providing deep hydration not only to the surface but also within the skin, effectively soothing tired skin affected by external factors.

Formulated without artificial colors or fragrances, this serum is perfect for sensitive skin, providing a skin-friendly and gentle experience free from synthetic additives. It absorbs seamlessly into the skin without any unpleasant odors or discoloration, making it an ideal daily care product that can be easily applied before makeup or at bedtime.

reviews.title: Serum
reviews.content: Skincare is a commitment to maintaining the health and vitality of the skin. Proper skincare routine includes habits & products for cleansing, hydrating, and protecting from environmental damage. Skincare is not merely a cosmetic concern; it’s essential for various reasons, primarily because the skin serves as a protective barrier against harmful elements like pollutants and UV rays. Neglecting skincare can cause acne, premature ageing, compromised immunity, etc. An effective skincare routine often includes cleansing, toning, and moisturising. Hydration is equally important, as it maintains the skin's moisture balance, preventing dryness and flakiness. Additionally, skincare routines often involve the use of sunscreen to shield the skin from the damaging effects of the sun's ultraviolet rays. This is especially pertinent in countries like India, where the sun's intensity is high, emphasising the importance of sun protection for skin health.

reviews.title: Absolutely Amazing for Sensitive Skin!
reviews.content: I’ve been using Dr.G R.E.D Blemish Clear Soothing Active Essence for a few weeks now, and I am absolutely in love with it! As someone with sensitive, acne-prone skin, I was initially hesitant to try new products, but this essence has exceeded all my expectations. The texture is lightweight and absorbs quickly into the skin without leaving any sticky residue. It feels incredibly soothing and provides instant hydration, which is perfect for calming irritated or inflamed areas. I noticed a significant reduction in redness and blemishes after just a few uses, and it leaves my skin feeling fresh and balanced.What I love most about this essence is how gentle it is—no stinging or discomfort whatsoever. It's perfect for sensitive skin types like mine, and I also appreciate that it doesn’t have a strong fragrance, making it feel even more comfortable to use. Overall, Dr.G R.E.D Blemish Clear Soothing Active Essence has become a staple in my skincare routine. It’s an absolute game-changer!

description:
Description

- DAILY SKIN CARE WITHOUT BURDEN: 
Moist and quickly absorbed, REEDLE SHOT effectively delivers active ingredients to improve skin texture. The optimal mixing ratio is applied, so it is not burdensome to use daily. 
- ABSORBS QUICKLY INTO THE SKIN: 
CICA REEDLE is made of silica, a natural mineral. It gently stimulates the skin to promote the absorption of active ingredients in VT skincare products.
- BENEFITS FOR YOUR SKIN:
Centella Asiatica Extract, Triple Hyaluronic Acid, Centella 4X Complex, and Green Propolis Extract are particularly effective for soothing and hydrating.
- SUITABLE FOR: 
REEDLE SHOT can be used by all skin types, but it is especially recommended for those who want to properly absorb the ingredients in skincare products into their skin, or simply remove dead skin cells with just a daily skincare routine, or those who use a variety of skincare products but can't feel the difference.
 
How To Use
Take an appropriate amount on a cleanly cleansed bare face, apply to the entire face, massage in a rolling motion to be completely absorbed, and then finish by pressing. After absorption, finish by applying moisturizing skin care or skin care containing active ingredients to increase efficacy.
 
Key Ingredients
Purified water, dipropylene glycol, glycerin, niacinamide, butylene glycol, macadamia seed oil, 1,2-hexanediol, ethylhexyl palmitate, sodium polyacrylate, sodium acrylate/sodium acryloyldimethyl. reviews.title: Goo
reviews.content: I recently came across a Korean skincare product that not only impressed me with its quality, but also completely won me over with the unique and thoughtful design — especially the written messages included on the packaging. From the moment I held it in my hands, I could feel that this wasn’t just any ordinary product. The attention to detail was immediately noticeable — the font, the layout, the words — everything was beautifully done. It had little messages of encouragement and care printed on the box and even on the container itself, and as simple as that sounds, it made a huge difference. It felt like the brand genuinely wanted to connect with the user, not just sell a product. It was as if I was receiving a small, personal note reminding me to take care of myself, and that kind of emotional connection is something you don’t find often in skincare. As for the product itself, it exceeded all my expectations. The texture was luxurious yet lightweight, and it absorbed into my skin ef

description:
Description

- This overnight serum provides gentle exfoliating power with pore care to create glass-like smooth skin.
- Contains 7% Rosemary Leaf Extract that gently soothes irritated and sensitive skin while removing the active oxygen accumulated inside the skin thanks to its antibacterial and anti-inflammatory properties.
- Formulated with 9% Lactic Acid, a type of AHA with gentle exfoliating power to remove dead skin cells and skin impurities and help maintain skin moisture.
- Enriched with Succinic Acid to eliminate blackheads and reduce pore size for creating smooth and clear skin.
- Features a lightweight fluid-type texture that can be easily absorbed by the skin.
How To Use
1. After washing your face in the evening, make sure your skin is dry.
2. Gently shake the product to ensure proper mixing, then evenly apply it across your face.
3. Use once a week at first, then work your way up to 2-3 times a week based on your skin's condition.
4. Cleanse your face with a gentle cleanser in the following morning.

Key Ingredients
Water, Lactic Acid, Dipropylene Glycol, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Methylpropanediol, Sodium Hydroxide, 1,2-Hexanediol, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Succinic Acid, Propanediol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Melia Azadirachta Leaf Extract, Hydrolyzed Gardenia Florida Extract, Hydrolyzed Malt Extract, Hydrolyzed Viola Tricolor Extract, Glyceryl Acrylate/Acrylic Acid Copolymer, Melia Azadirachta Flower Extract, Allantoin, Betaine, Panthenol, Hyaluronic Acid, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate

description:
Description

- A brightening serum infused with vitamin C to focus on improving blemishes from within the skin in 4 weeks.
- Formulated with pure vitamin C to deliver moisture-filled vitality to dull skin.
- Contains Niacinamide and Adenosine for daily elasticity and radiance care.
- Contains mulberry root extract and pearl extract to provide flawless and clean skin condition.
- Contains 6 types of Hyaluronic Acid and Panthenol to offer prolonged radiant glow to the skin.
- Formulation that absorbs into the skin moistly without stickiness.
- Dermatology tested, certified as non-irritating product.
- All ingredients are rated EWG green grade, containing only healthy and mild ingredients.
How To Use
1. After cleansing and toning, apply a moderate amount and spread gently on the skin.
2. Wet a cotton pad sufficiently and apply it to the area that needs moisturizing for 5-10 minutes to use it as an intensive moisturizing mask.
Tip. You can more easily dispense the serum by pressing down on the rubber part of the dropper and putting it back into the container, then relaxing your hands.

Key Ingredients
Water, Methylpropanediol, Glycerin, 1,2-Hexanediol, Niacinamide, Panthenol, Betaine, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Tromethamine, Glycereth-25 PCA Isostearate, Allantoin, Pearl Extract, Dipropylene Glycol, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Citrate, Adenosine, Ethylhexylglycerin, Disodium EDTA, Butylene Glycol, Polyglyceryl-10 Myristate, Citric Acid, Gluconolactone, Sodium Hyaluronate, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Chrysanthemum Morifolium Flower Extract, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Hyaluronate, Broussonetia Kazinoki Root Extract, Pentylene Glycol, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate, Hyaluronic Acid, Ascorbic Acid

reviews.title: Very Bad Allergic Reaction
reviews.content: I'm not that new to vitamin c, however, I should of take precaution because this vitamin c serum was very potent. At first used, my skin was good, no reaction what so ever. However, as I continued to incorporated into my skincare routine, I've noticed my skin was peeling, like the aftermath of a sunburn and your skin peels, YES and redness. I immediately stopped using it and at two weeks went by, my skin was much better. Sometimes, what others recommend may not work for them but no you and that's okay.

reviews.title: Notice it's benefits
reviews.content: This serum isn't lightweight -in fact, it's quite rich. As a result only a small amount is needed. It imparts a nice, bright glow. I have been using this serum for two weeks and definitely noticed it's benefits. My skin looks smoother and brighter. Really enjoyed using this serum.

product_name: Black Carrot Vita-A Retinol Firming Ampoule 30ml
description:
Description

- A vegan ampoule enriched with Black Carrot Retinol to offers intensive skin firming effect.
- Infused with Ectoin to offer soothing effect to calm irritated skin.
- Keeps your skin moisturized with 10 types of Hyaluronic Acids.
- Helps improve enlarged pores by repairing skin elasticity.
- Presents a moisturizing texture that penetrates on skin quickly without leaving greasiness.
- Passed Skin Irritation Test and Vegan proved ingredients that free from 18 harmful ingredients, suitable for sensitive skin.
How To Use
1. Before you use it on your face, please apply it on the inside area of your arm (soft skin area) and test for irritation before using it on your face.
2. It is not recommended to use it on the day when your skin is especially sensitive.
3. Make sure to use sunscreen after applying this during day time.
4. Pregnant women and lactating women is not recommended to use this product.

Water, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Root Extract (20%), methyl Propanediol, Glycerin, Dipropylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Niacinamide, Polyglycerin-3, Centella Asiatica Extract, Ficus Carica (Fig) Fruit Extract, Phellodendron Amurense Bark Extract, Portulaca Oleracea Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Extract, Cynara Scolymus (Artichoke) Leaf Extract, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Seed Extract, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Water, Sodium Hyaluronate, Canola Oil, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Seed Oil(0.004ppm), Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Betaine, Phenyl Trimethicone, Hydroxyethyl Urea, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Sodium Acrylic Acid/MA Copolymer, Ceramide NP, Xanthan Gum, Ectoin, Butylene Glycol, Sucrose Distearate, Adenosine, Carbomer, Disodium EDTA, Tromethamine, Polyquaternium-51, Beta-Glucan, Glyceryl Stearate , Retinol(506IU), HDI/Trimethylol Hexyllactone Crosspolymer, Propanediol, Polyvinyl Alcohol, Tocopherol, Dimethylsilanol Hyaluronate, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Tetrahydropiperine, Potassium Hyaluronate, Phloretin, Hyaluronic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Hyaluronate, Sodium Hyaluronate Dimethylsilanol, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate, Arginine, Beta-Carotene, Tocopheryl Acetate, Phenylpropanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Caprylyl Glycol

description:
Description

Mugener Phyto soothing ampoule is extra powerful when it comes to calming and moisturizing your skin thanks to the plant-derived phytomucin, the 5-ingredient phyto complex and aloe vera leaf juice contained in the product. The formula also contains madecassoside and allantoin, which  provide hydration to irritated skin and soothe it in combination with hyaluronic acid.  
The 5-ingredient phyto complex contains the following plant-derived ingredients: 
Asiatic pennywort extract - helps with skin soothing 
Portulaca extract - helps with skin soothing 
Green tea extract - helps with retaining moisture 
Licorice extract - helps with skin soothing 
Calendula - strengthens the skin barrier
The non-sticky texture of the ampule allows it to get absorbed in the skin the moment it is applied. 



Suggested Use

reviews.title: Good
reviews.content: Love it love it love it love it love it love it love it

reviews.title: I really love it
reviews.content: I’ve been using the Jumiso Snail Mucin 95 + Peptide and it’s actually a pretty solid serum. I have oily and sensitive skin, and luckily it didn’t irritate me or cause breakouts. The texture is lightweight, though it does have a bit of stickiness at first which is I think it’s normal for snail mucin but it goes away after a minutes or so. It made my skin feel smoother and more hydrated over time. I think results vary depending on your skin type, and it takes some time to see visible improvement. Overall, it’s gentle, calming, and works well in a daily routine if you’re patient. I haven’t used it with vitamin C yet, so I can’t really judge how well they work together.

description:
Description


HYAAH Licorice First Essence helps soothe the skin and can be beneficial for skin concerns such as anti-inflammatory effects, hives, and itching because of one of the key components of Licorice, Glycyrrhizin. Using a Licorice mask as the first step after cleansing creates a soothing foundation for the skin, even when it's sensitive and prone to irritation.

Formulated with Licorice extract, Hyaluronic Acid and Allantoin. A carefully selected Licorice grown in upper areas in Jirisan, South Korea. Extracted at low temperatures to minimize nutrient loss. 

Suitable for oily and sensitive skin.

How To Use

Using a licorice mask as the first step after cleansing creates a soothing foundation for the skin, even when it's sensitive and prone to irritation. Key IngredientsPurified water, licorice extract (20%), propanediol, 1,2-hexanediol, allantoin, ethylhexylglycerin, sodium hyaluronate

description:
Description


- IMPROVEMENT TO HEALTHY SKIN: A night care product that induces changes in skin condition overnight by wrapping the skin with a soft texture cream rich in moisture. As a special home skin care product that can be used every 7 days, it helps your skin to have a healthy condition, such as improving skin turnover.
- ABSORBS QUICKLY INTO THE SKIN: CICA REEDLE is made of silica, a natural mineral. It gently stimulates the skin to promote the absorption of active ingredients in VT skincare products. ※The tingling sensation is a natural phenomenon that occurs as the product absorbs into the skin and supplies nutrients.※
- BENEFITS FOR YOUR SKIN: Centella Asiatica Extract, Triple Hyaluronic Acid, Centella 4X Complex, and Green Propolis Extract are particularly effective for soothing and hydrating.
- SUITABLE FOR: REEDLE SHOT 700 is a gentle yet effective exfoliating serum that can be used by all skin types. It is perfect for those who want to take care of their skin while they sleep, or who want to exfoliate their skin as part of their daily skincare routine. REEDLE SHOT 700 is also a great option for those who want to restore their skin's balance and natural vitality.
- CAUTION: If you are allergic or have skin troubles, test a localized area before use. It is not recommended to use with a skin care device as it can cause severe skin irritation. Consumers who are sensitive to skin irritation should refrain from using it. Do not use the product on inflamed or wounded areas.

How To Use

- During night skincare routine, after washing your face, spread proper amount evenly and massage until absorbed.
- Reedle shot 700 can be used every 7 days, but do not use with reedle shot 100 and 700 at the same time.
- Do not use with a device and after receiving cosmetic procedures, stop use when irritation occurs.

reviews.content: This lives my skin smooth like a baby face, you need to use a good moisturizer after using it, but is totally worth it

reviews.title: Viral product
reviews.content: I have sensitive skin, so I started my acquaintance with this viral product with the concentration "100" and with the trial version (10 sticks of 2 ml). I liked the result. The booster is applied to clean, dry skin as the first leave-in step. It is used only at night: the "100" version every day, and the "300" version once every 3 days. While using the trial version, my skin looked good - my complexion was even and there were no breakouts. The booster is absorbed quickly, leaving the skin slightly moisturized, but not sticky. My sensitive skin felt absolutely comfortable. Yes, there is a slight tingling sensation when applying and layering the following products that same evening. And these sensations persist until I wash my face in the morning. But I sleep 100% comfortably, including when in contact with the pillow. That is, I do not experience any discomfort at all. Therefore, I decided to buy the full-size version of the product. The packaging looks simply luxurious.

reviews.title: It works, give it time.
reviews.content: I have sensitive skin, so I’m usually cautious with brightening serums — but this one has been a pleasant surprise. The Celimax Pore + Dark Spot Brightening Serum feels super lightweight, absorbs beautifully, and doesn't leave any stickiness behind. What I love most is that it seems to actually be doing something. description:
Description

140ml/70ea l Exfoliating, Mild-Peeling Pads

Skin impurities and clogged pores caused by various environmental factors such as ultraviolet rays, temperature changes, and fine dust, are not easily removed by ordinary cleansing. To address various skin concerns like blackheads caused by these impurities blocking the pores, it is necessary to start skincare on a clean skin base by using an essence pad to thoroughly remove makeup residue and impurities covering the skin.

Our Clearing Skin Prep Essence Pad, which contains AHA, BHA, PHA + & red beet extract, gently takes care of these impurities without irritation, prevents the formation of pores, and helps manage a clear skin texture by preventing skin blemishes and other troubles.
 
How To Use
1. After cleansing the face, use the tweezer to pick up a cotton pad and apply it on the areas that require intensive care.

2. After 5 to 10 minutes, gently wipe the entire face and pat the skin to help it absorb the remaining essence.

3. It can be used daily during the day and at night. Please use sunscreen after use before leaving.

4. After use, close the box's lid to prevent the pads to dry.
 
Key Ingredients
BETA VULGARIS (BEET) ROOT EXTRACT, WATER, DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL, METHYLPROPANEDIOL, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, 1,2

HEXANEDIOL, THEOBROMA CACA O (COCOA) SEED EXTRACT, GARDENIA FLORIDA FRUIT

EXTRACT, PANTHENOL, TREHALOSE, DISODIUM EDTA, XANTHAN GUM, TROMETHAMINE, GLUCONOLACTONE, ALLANTOIN, GLYCOLIC ACID, DEXTRIN, C YAN OCOBALAMIN, SALICYLIC ACID,

HYDROXYACETOPHENONE

This essence is formulated with 100% Centella Asiatica extract, known for its calming and anti-inflammatory properties. The lightweight, fast-absorbing texture leaves my skin feeling hydrated and soothed without any sticky residue. After consistent use, I’ve noticed a significant reduction in redness and irritation, and my skin appears more radiant and balanced. I appreciate that it contains minimal ingredients, making it suitable for those with sensitive or reactive skin. Overall, the MIXSOON Soondy Centella Asiatica Essence has become a staple in my regimen, providing gentle yet effective care for my skin’s needs.

reviews.title: Exceptional Hydration and Skin Revival
reviews.content: I’ve been using the Numbuzin No.6 Deep Sleep Mask Serum for a few weeks now, and the transformation in my skin is remarkable. This serum, with its lightweight, almost watery texture, absorbs quickly without any sticky residue, making it a seamless addition to my nighttime routine. The inclusion of 63% glacial water and a blend of hyaluronic acids ensures intense hydration, leaving my skin feeling plump and rejuvenated by morning. Notably, it has also calmed any redness and softened dry patches, providing a smooth and radiant complexion. I appreciate that it’s free from artificial fragrances and colors, making it suitable for my sensitive skin. Overall, this serum has become a staple in my skincare regimen, delivering visible results with consistent use.

reviews.title: The Vitamin C 23 Serum – 20ml
reviews.content: Textura oleosa, la absorción no es tan rápida como los otros sérums, al principio senti un poco de hormigueo pero con el uso se desvaneció la sensación, pero nunca fue irritante, deja una sensación oleosa en la piel; si tu piel tiende a grasa te recomiendo usarlo únicamente de noche y por lo menos 1 hora antes de dormir para que no dejes el producto en la almohada. Este sérum es la competencia directa del sérum de 23% de TIAM con excepción que el de TIAM no deja la sensación oleosa. He sufrido de un pequeño brote que me dejo algunas marcas y en la semana que lo utilice pude ver una ligera mejoría, con el uso de al menos 1 mes se deberán ver mejores resultados. Probado en tipo de piel: Mixta con tendencia a grasa. No recompraría porque no siento que sea compatible con mi piel, pero si tu piel tiende a seca es una excelente opción.

reviews.title: Impressive high concentration serum!
reviews.content: This concentrated vitamin C derm serum was developed with maximum effectiveness and minimum irritation, thus making it useable for those with sensitive skin. This serum comes with a special cap that helps seal the serum while controlling the gas generated inside the container by the vitamin C. There are quite a few cautions that come with this serum, which can be a bit alarming at first, but overall they make sense and are to maintain the vitamin C properties for as long as possible. It's just new for me that a product comes with more warnings than "avoid eye conact". I have sensitive, combination, acne-prone, maturing skin, so all aspects of this serum are appealing! I tried it every other day at the beginning to get my skin used to the potency of the vitamin C. I did noticed changes after the first use where my skin looked more radiant. I was surprised how much more quickly my acne scars were fading away. The serum didn't seem to irritate my skin at all! I really like it!

reviews.title: My holy grail
high concentration of vitamin C
reviews.content: The highest concentration of serum for Vitamin C! This Vitamin C serum is tinted yellow and feels a bit sticky when applied. I am not a fan of the smell of this product, it reminds me of metal. However, when you apply it, your skin feels hydrated and glowy. This serum doesn't have a long shelf life as it will oxidize; it has to be used within 2 months after opening. I haven’t used this product long enough to see results like acne scars fading.

I love this serum and I plan to continue using this product. Stored in a 30ml glass bottle, 2 months PAO and needs to be refrigerated once you open it. It has a clear gel texture with a runny consistency it smells like citrus but it goes away once it spreads on your skin. the first week I applied this serum daily but I noticed it made my skin look dull. i don't know maybe vitamin c 23% is too high for my skin or maybe my skin is not getting enough hydration or over exfoliating. but after that i reduced the usage to 3 times a week and it worked great. It doesn't dry out my skin anymore and it made my skin glow and feel better.After 3 weeks,I noticed that my skin has changed significantly.my skin is definitely getting brighter. The texture also improves and becomes softer and smoother.

reviews.title: تونر
reviews.content: ي أفقد ثقتي بنفسي، لكن بفضل هذا المنتج السحري، استعدت إشراقة بشرتي الطبيعية. المكونات الطبيعية مثل زيت الأرغان وفيتامين C النقي عملت معجزات في ترطيب وتوحيد لون بشرتي. أصبحت لا أحتاج لوضع الكثير من المكياج، وأتلقى إطراءً مستمراً من صديقاتي وعائلتي عن نضارة وجهي. حتى أن زميلاتي في العمل لاحظن التغيير وسألنني عن سر هذا التحول! الملمس الحريري للكريم وامتصاصه السريع جعل روتيني الصباحي متعة حقيقية. لم أعد أشعر بالحرج من النظر في المرآة، بل أصبحت أستمتع برؤية انعكاس وجهي المشرق كل صباح. التهاب البشرة والاحمرار اللذان كانا يزعجانني اختفيا تماماً، وأصبحت بشرتي أكثر مرونة ونعومة. النتائج التي حصلت عليها تفوق كل توقعاتي وتستحق كل قرش دفعته في هذا المنتج الرائع. أنصح كل من يعاني من مشاكل البشرة بتجربته، فهو حقاً يستحق كل هذا العناء في البحث عن منتج مثالي للبشرة. قد يبدو سعره مرتفعاً قليلاً، لكن النتائج المذهلة تجع

product_name: Glow Deep Serum: Rice + Alpha Arbutin 30ml
description:
Description

This serum is designed for those with concerns about pigmentation and uneven skin tone. Containing 68% rice bran water and 2% alpha arbutin, it helps to improve skin tone to become brighter and healthier.
- A light-weight, hydrating serum enriched with Hanbang(traditional Korean herbal medicine) ingredients for skin brightening & anti-pigmentation.- Radiant Revelation: Unveil the beauty secrets of Joseon with the Glow Deep Serum, a meticulously crafted blend of rice and alpha-arbutin for unparalleled radiance. Address dark spots, discoloration, and acne scars with a powerful formula enriched with rice and alpha arbutin.- Korean Skincare Essential: Elevate your skincare routine with the Beauty of Joseon Glow Deep Serum, a commitment to timeless k-beauty secrets that unlocks the path to glowing, flawless skin.- Deep Hydration, Rice Bran: Rice bran water moisturizes, enhances suppleness. Experience intense hydration alongside pigmentation correction for ultimate skin health.- Tackle Skin Concerns: Suited for all skin types, even sensitive. Tackle uneven tone, dark spots, and dryness. Reveal luminosity and confidence in your skin's journey.
- Brightening Solution : Glow Deep Seum: Rice +Alpha Arbutin 30ml- Cruelty-free and Vegan
Suggested Use

Apply a proper amount of serum onto the face and pat gently to help absorption 
Key Ingredients
- Rice bran water 68% : Rice has played a very important role as a staple food and skin care ingredient in Korean history.
In the Joseon Dynasty, rice bran water was used like the toner of today, and was called Beauty Water, used for beautiful skin. Rice bran is rich in amino acids and minerals, helping to moisturize dry skin.
- Alpha-Arbutin 2% : Alpha-Arbutin works by inhibiting the tyrosinase activity that limits the melanin production in your skin. Additionally, it is also known to have a 10 times greater effect than regular Beta-Arbutin.​

description:
Description

A unique, oil-free formulation containing 5 different forms of Hyaluronic Acids ( Hyaluronic Acid, Hydrolyzed Glycosaminoglycans, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Sodium Hyaluronate and Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid). These 5 ingredients are included in the formula at varying amounts and each has its’ own function, all of which aid in the delivery of moisture to the various layers of the skin to help in enhancing the end results achieved.
An added extra benefit it contains patented Dual Ceramides to help strengthen the skin barrier and seal in hydration for a longer time period and does not leave the skin feeling parched. 
Infused with Panthenol to calm, Madecassoside to moisturize and Allantoin to soothe.
Suggested Use

After preparing the skin texture, take an appropriate amount of the ampoule, apply it gently on the skin, and pat lightly for absorption.
Full Ingredients

Water, Dipropylene Glycol, Niacinamide, 1,2-Hexanediol, Glycerin, Methyl glycol-20, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Arginine, Allantoin, Panthenol, Sodium hyaluronate, Adenosine, Pentylene Glycol, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Xanthum Gum, Azadirachta indica leaf extract, Azadirachta indica flower extract, Chamomile Extract, Blue Tansy Essential Oil, Azulene, Madecassoside, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Hedera helix extract, Xylitol, Erythritol, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil, Hyaluronic Acid, Solanum Melongena (Eggplant) Fruit Extract, Aloe Vera flower extract, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Hyaluronate, Thymus vulgaris essential oil, Myristoyl/Palmitoyl Oxostearamide/Arachamide Mea (MLE), Linoleic Acid, Phytosterol, Centella Asiatica Extract, Ocimum sanctum leaf extract, Lychee Oil, Curcuma Longa Root Extract, Corallina officinalis extract, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydroxyacetophenone.

description:
Description


The light and refreshing water-type liquid serum absorbs quickly and soaks into the skin. It contains only the moisturizing essentials for the skin and helps to keep the skin moist and matte on the outside, helping to create a balanced skin.
Formula based on Tea Tree Extract is working wonders for treating acne-prone skin. Tea tree - a natural anti-inflammatory and antibacterial agent has been shown to fight against the type of bacteria that causes acne.



Suggested Use

When care is needed due to excessive oil, apply an appropriate amount of Tea Tree Pore Purifying Serum with a dropper and pat gently for absorption.
Key Ingredients

Melaleuca Alternifolia Leaf Extract, Dipropylene Glycol(Moisturizer), Niacinamide(Sebum control agent), Glycerin(Plant-derived moisturizer), Zinc PCA, 1,2-Hexanediol(Emollient), Glyceryl Glucoside(Plant-derived moisturizer), Aqua, Ethylhexylglycerin(Emollient)

original_name: [Beauty of Joseon] Revive Serum : Ginseng + Snail Mucin 30ml

description:
Description

This serum is made for troubles with large pores and inflamed skin. Containing 60% propolis extract and 2% niacinamide, it helps to control sebum secretion and keeps the skin moist.
A honey-like serum enriched with Hanbang(traditional Korean herbal medicine) ingredients for fighting against acne, reducing pores.
This Glow Serum contains niacinamide and lotus corniculatus to further enhance the brightening effect.Fighting against acne.- Suitable for all skin types. In particular, it is designed for concerns about enlarged pores and inflammatory skin.- For textured skin, layer with Green Plum Bubble Toner to remove sebum inside and outside the pores and provide moisture. - For a subtle glow finish, you can layer with Dynasty Cream.Suggested UseApply 2-3 drops of serum onto the face and pat gently to aid absorption.
Key Ingredients
- Propolis extract 60% : There is a record that women in the Joseon Dynasty used honey and grain powder as a wash-off mask pack to care for their skin. As a skincare ingredient, proplis extract is effective for hydrating the skin improving inflammed skin.
- Niacinamide 2% : Among the various effects of niacinamide, it is especially helpful in controlling sebum secretion and maintaining the oil and moisture balance of the skin.
- BHA 0.5% : As a fat-soluble exfoliant, it helps to remove sebum and wastes accumulated in the pores.

description:
Description


Iceplant extract is combined with botanical extracts to provide skin with featherweight, lasting moisture while protecting against harsh climates and pollution. Formulated into a cooling gel cream, iceplant extract from the Sahara helps to soothe, hydrate, and minimize the appearance of pores. The all-in-one product is designed to condense serum and moisturizer into one step that nourishes and hydrates skin without heaviness.

Suggested Use


Spread a pea-size amount of Pressed Serum all over the face and neck after cleansing and toning. 


Ingredients

Mesembryanthemum Crystallinum Extract, Water(58.42%), Butylene Glycol, Cyclopentasiloxane, Glycerin, 1,2Hexanediol, Glycereth-26, Bis-PEG-18 Methyl Ether Dimethyl Silane, Cyclohexasiloxane, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Saccharomyces/Viscum Album (Mistletoe) Ferment Extract, Allantoin, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Potassium Hydroxide, Lactobacillus/Soybean Ferment Extract, Saccharomyces/Imperata Cylindrica Root Ferment Extract, Xanthan Gum, Melia Azadirachta Leaf Extract, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Disodium EDTA, Melia Azadirachta Flower Extract, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil, Polyglutamic Acid, Coccinia Indica Fruit Extract, Solanum Melongena (Eggplant) Fruit Extract, Amber Powder, Citrus Aurantifolia (Lime) Oil, Ocimum Sanctum Leaf Extract, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil, Pelargonium Graveolens Flower Oil, Juniperus Mexicana Oil, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Oil, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Oil, Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil, Corallina Officinalis Extract, Candida Bombicola/Glucose/Methyl Rapeseedate Ferment, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Selaginella Tamariscina Extract, Houttuynia Cordata Extract, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Extract, Cuscuta Australis Seed Extract, Ulmus Davidiana Root Extract, Pueraria Lobata Root Extract, Pinus Palustris Leaf Extract, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Flower Extract

description:
Description


Packed with eight different peptide and vitamin-rich beans, including lentils, black beans, and red beans, the bouncy and light liquid rejuvenates dull skin for a youthful effect. The Vitamin E-filled ‘pulp’ efficiently delivers nourishment, helping to slow signs of aging while invigorating skin.

Suggested Use


Gently pat a dime-sized amount onto face in a circular motion after cleansing, and then follow with usual skincare routine. Pat gently onto the skin in a circular motion and follow with a deeply hydrating moisturizer or cream.


Ingredients


Water, Panax Ginseng Root Extract(11%) Arctium Lappa Root Extract(8.75%), Nelumbo Nucifera Root Extract(8.75%), Codonopsis Lanceolata Root Extract(8.75%), Platycodon Grandiflorum Root Extract(8.75%), Butylene Glycol, Glycereth-26, 1,2-Hexanediol, Hydroxyethyl Urea, Glycerin, Dimethicone, Propylene Glycol, PEG40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Imperata Cylindrica Root Extract, Viscum Album (Mistletoe) Leaf Extract, Isopropyl Myristate, Dipropylene Glycol, Potassium Hydroxide, Disodium EDTA, Caramel, Xanthan Gum, Rosa Damascena Flower Oil, Candida Bombicola/Glucose/Methyl Rapeseedate Ferment, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Pentylene Glycol, Ginkgo Biloba Nut Extract, Morus Alba Fruit Extract, Punica Granatum Fruit Extract, Ficus Carica (Fig) Fruit Extract, Paeonia Albiflora Root Extract, Poria Cocos Extract, Astragalus Membranaceus Root Extract, Dioscorea Japonica Root Extract, Rehmannia Glutinosa Root Extract, Rhodiola Rosea Root Extract, Lepidium Meyenii Root Extract, Cimicifuga Racemosa Root Extract, Angelica Gigas Root Extract, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Leaf Extract, Paeonia Suffruticosa Root Extract, Caprylyl Glycol
